row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File to create" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Create full path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_FULL_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File to create" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Create full path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_FULL_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#

errors=0 if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "1" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory with name '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE#' already exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR errors=1 elif [ "$ISFILE" -eq "1" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE#' already exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR errors=1 fi
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 exit 100 :ENDIF
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then exit $errors fi
! Start execution :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create file '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE#'" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:IF &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_FULL_PATH# = "YES" dir=`dirname "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE#"` mkdir -p "$dir" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF
touch "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
